Doc: A type to define automatic exercise of a swaption. With automatic exercise the option is deemed to have exercised if it is in the money by more than the threshold amount on the exercise date.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type to define automatic exercise of a swaption. With automatic exercise the option is deemed to have exercised if it is in the money by more than the threshold amount on the exercise date.
 #/
record FpML5.confirmation.AutomaticExercise {
  # A threshold rate. The threshold of 0.10% would be represented as 0.001
  thresholdRate : decimal

}

thresholdRate.Doc: A threshold rate. The threshold of 0.10% would be represented as 0.001
thresholdRate.Name: thresholdRate
